titleStmt.title: A discovery of the impostures of witches and astrologers by John Brinley.
titleStmt.author: Brinley, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Wright and sold by Edward Milward ,

notesStmt.note: Second part has special t.p. (p. [67]): The second part, being a discourse of the impostures practised in judicial astrology. London : Printed in the year 1680.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
